about_the_game:
Humans vs Tigers is a very challenging game which offers a huge number of levels. Your goal is to increase your team of hunters until you reach the tiger. Gather them but be very careful in same time to the very dangerous obstacles that you will encounter in your way.

Pass them without crashing like the F1 drivers :)

You need to have enough hunters to get to the next level. Once you've gathered them all and reached the tiger, move on without any problems!

Game Features:
- 51 challenging levels
- As the level passes, the obstacles become more complicated and complicated, like hammer or knives
- Your team is located random in the level and as an exception it's not necessery to gather them all but at least 60-80% depending on the level
detailed_description:
A CINEMATIC SPACE SHOOTER - WISHLIST NOW!



About the Game

Humans vs Tigers is a very challenging game which offers a huge number of levels. Your goal is to increase your team of hunters until you reach the tiger. Gather them but be very careful in same time to the very dangerous obstacles that you will encounter in your way.

Pass them without crashing like the F1 drivers :)

You need to have enough hunters to get to the next level. Once you've gathered them all and reached the tiger, move on without any problems!

Game Features:
- 51 challenging levels
- As the level passes, the obstacles become more complicated and complicated, like hammer or knives
- Your team is located random in the level and as an exception it's not necessery to gather them all but at least 60-80% depending on the level
name: Humans vs Tigers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics
  • Storage: 110 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics
  • Storage: 110 MB available space
